scripts.dev: cd ../.. && if [ -n "$OLLAMA_HOST_OVERRIDE" ]; then docker-compose up --build --remove-orphans --scale ollama=0; else docker-compose up --build --remove-orphans; fi
scripts.lint: poetry run python -m ruff check src/ tests/
scripts.lint:fix: poetry run python -m ruff check src/ tests/ --fix
scripts.format: poetry run python -m ruff format src/ tests/
